name: Catharsis (Engi12)
description:
The game is about the search of one's self after a big loss. It consists of 5 levels each related to 5 stages of grief. Players first start at the stage denial, the level consists of the defense of a person in denial. 
The second map is about the anger. It is reflected by the portrait of a someone who wants to break what he has in mind. 
Third level is Negotiation. It consists of a race and self proclaim by the people.
Fourth level is Depression. It is portraited as a maze and consists of slease spiders that wants to hurt the protagonist.
Fifth level is acceptance. The person accepts the scene as a whole and finds themselves home.

second map is done by going up the ramp.
third map is done by following the circuit in 120 seconds.
Depression is about the survival here too.

Arrows to move
Press R to reset
Space to boost
Shift to Deny
